thread.section_title: Cardinal Hotel St. Peter - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice stay
thread.title_full: Nice stay - Review of Cardinal Hotel St. Peter, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Marcus A
title: Nice stay
text: The place isn't perfect, but do you go to Rome to stay in your room? Very friendly staff. Rooms very nice and clean. Bed was amazingly comfortable. Very close to grocery stores, good restaurants and transportation. Only a few miles walking distance to the Vatican. Not a bad area day or night. Didnt eat breakfast but I heard it was terrific. If you are expecting more from this place, you are expecting too much. I would stay there again if given the chance.
